name: Laachey Dar Parathey Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Laachey Dar Parathey Recipe: All Purpose Flour ½ kg Milk 1 cup Butter 2-3 tbsp Clarified Butter for fry Salt to taste
instructions: Take a mixing bowl add ½ kg of all purpose of flour, add 2-3 tbsp of butter Add to taste salt mix it well with 1 cup of milk to make a soft dough Make small balls roll it long long and roll it with help of rolling pin. Now take a tawa pan add clarified butter fry the paratha âs and serve it hot. Now laachey dar paratha is ready.
